name.en: Behemoth the King of All Animals

summoning_condition.en: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 monster. If you do, its original ATK becomes 2000.

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Add Beast Type monsters from your Graveyard to your hand equal to [the number of monsters Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card].
